title: The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield puts on a VERY busty display in an orange jumpsuit
text:
She was rejected by Matt Agnew on the season finale of The Bachelor.

But on Saturday, Abbie Chatfield didn't appear to have a care in the world as she partied with her pals.

The 24-year-old, who appeared to be at a house party, took to Instagram to share a photo of her eye-popping outfit.

'Beer is better on the floor!' The Bachelor's Abbie Chatfield (pictured) put on a very busty display in an orange jumpsuit, sharing the photo, taken at a house party, to Instagram Saturday

The reality star put on a very busty display in an orange jumpsuit with a white floral pattern.

It featured ruffled sleeves and a cropped out mid-section, belted by a ring, showing off the beauty's taut tummy.

Most stunning however was the outfit's very low-cut v-neckline, which showcased the beauty's ample assets to great effect.

Lost! Photos on Abbie's Instagram Stories showed her posing on the floor with a pal, still holding her drink, and revealed the pair had lost a game of peer pong

Abbie captioned the fun photo, in which she's crouched on wooden floorboards and sipping a drink from a red cup: 'Beer is better on the floor'.

Photos and Bommerang clips on Abbie's Instagram Stories showed her posing again on the floor, this time with a pal, still holding her drink, and revealed the pair had lost a game of peer pong.

She also took some photos with a friend in the bathroom, flaunting her amazing ensemble once again.

Wow! She also took some photos with a friend in the bathroom, flaunting her amazing ensemble once again

On Friday, Abbie took to Instagram to share a lengthy post thanking the 'amazing angels' who helped her get through the tough period.

But while she was quick to thank third-place finalist Helena Sauzier, she notably missed out former pal Chelsie McLeod - who won The Bachelor's heart - and Matt himself.

'Just some of the amazing angels who have helped me through the last six months. Love you lots,' she wrote, alongside pictures with some of her close friends.
description: She was rejected by Matt Agnew on the season finale of The Bachelor.
authors: Marta Jary For Daily Mail Australia
